flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to earn $150 more dollars because 500 - 200 - 150 = <<500-200-150=120>>120
He needs to sell 16 games because 120 / 7.5 = <<120/7.5=16>>16
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
